mapper.insert: insert into chat(chatroom_id, user_id, message, chat_read) values(#{chatroom.no}, #{sender.no}, #{message}, #{read})
mapper.select: select c.chat_id, c.user_id as sender_id, cr.user_id as participant_id, u.nickname, c.message, c.chat_date from chat c left join chatroom cr on c.chatroom_id = cr.chatroom_id left join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where c.chatroom_id = #{roomNo} order by c.chat_date desc limit #{pageNo}, #{pageCount}

select cr.chatroom_id, cr.user_id as participant_id, up.nickname as participant_nickname, up.photo as participant_photo, b.board_id, b.user_id as owner_id, uo.nickname as owner_nickname, uo.photo as owner_photo, c1.message, c1.user_id as sender_id, c1.chat_date, c1.chat_read, unread_counts.unread_count as count from chatroom cr left join user up on cr.user_id = up.user_id left join board b on cr.board_id = b.board_id left join user uo on b.user_id = uo.user_id inner join ( select chatroom_id, user_id, message, chat_date, chat_read from chat c where chat_date = ( select max(chat_date) from chat where chatroom_id = c.chatroom_id ) ) c1 on cr.chatroom_id = c1.chatroom_id left join ( select chatroom_id, count(*) as unread_count from chat where chat_read = 0 group by chatroom_id ) unread_counts on cr.chatroom_id = unread_counts.chatroom_id where b.user_id = #{no} or cr.user_id = #{no} order by c1.chat_date desc;

select cr.chatroom_id, cr.user_id as participant_id, b.board_id, b.user_id as owner_id, b.title, b.post_date, tb.collection_id, cl.name, tb.price from chatroom cr left join board b on cr.board_id = b.board_id left join trade_board tb on cr.board_id = tb.board_id left join collection cl on tb.collection_id = cl.collection_id where cr.chatroom_id = #{no}
select chatroom_id from chatroom where board_id = #{boardNo} and user_id = #{userNo}
